TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteValueExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 擷取對應至路由頁面中所指定 URL 參數的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value that corresponds to a specified URL parameter in a routed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別讓您能夠使用標記來將伺服器控制項屬性設定為其中一個路由頁面的 URL 參數的值。The class makes it possible to use markup to set the property of a server control to the value of one of the URL parameters in a routed page. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 URL 參數的值顯示標記`searchterm`。The following example shows how to use markup to display the value of the URL parameter `searchterm`. 使用定義路由`http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}`與 URL 模式。The route is defined by using `http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}` as the URL pattern. ``` ``` 如果要求網頁的 url `http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles`、控制項會顯示 「 自行車 」。If the page is requested with the URL `http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles`, the control displays "Bicycles".

summary.span: 擷取對應至指定之路由索引鍵的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value that corresponds to a specified route key.

returns.span: 對應至針對目前頁面所指定 URL 參數的值。

span.span: The value that corresponds to the URL parameter that is specified for the current page.

returns.span: 如果 為 或不是衍生自 ，方法就會傳回 。

span.span: The method returns if is or if it does not derive from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫這個方法時的格式運算式`<%$ RouteValue:urlparameter %>`發生無編譯網頁中。ASP.NET calls this method when an expression of the form `<%$ RouteValue:urlparameter %>` is encountered in a no-compile page. 這個方法會覆寫方法藉由呼叫方法。This method overrides the method by calling the method. 它會取得物件從`context`參數，並且取得運算式，控制項類型和屬性名稱從`entry`參數。It gets the object from the `context` parameter, and it gets the expression, the control type, and the property name from the `entry` parameter.

Properties for the control or page.

summary.span: 傳回程式碼運算式，用來在產生的頁面類別中執行屬性指派。

span.span: Returns a code expression that is used to perform the property assignment in the generated page class.
An expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CodeDOM 建立網頁或控制項時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when the CodeDOM is created for a page or control. 傳回的物件都代表要加入產生的頁面類別的屬性指派的程式碼運算式。The object that is returned represents the code expression to add to the property assignment in the generated page class.

summary.span: 擷取對應至所指定 URL 參數的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value that corresponds to the specified URL parameter.

returns.span: 對應至針對目前頁面所指定 URL 參數的值。

returns.span: 如果 不是 、 的 屬性為 ，或者 是空的或 ，則方法會傳回 。

span.span: If is , if the property of is , or if is empty or , the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取適當的值，指定`key`值使用屬性`page`。This method retrieves the appropriate value for the specified `key` value by using the property of `page`. 然後它會使用`controlType`和`propertyName`值，以尋找適當的類型轉換器，才能將擷取的值轉換為正確的型別。It then uses the `controlType` and `propertyName` values to find the appropriate type converter in order to convert the retrieved value into the correct type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsEvaluate As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsEvaluate { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否可在未編譯的頁面中評估運算式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否方法已經在類別中實作以在單一頁面就不會編譯以傳回運算式的值。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class in order to return a value for the expression in a page that is not compiled. 類別可以評估的運算式未編譯的頁面中。The class can evaluate an expression in a page that is not compiled. 因此，它會一律傳回`true`。Therefore, it always returns `true`.
